title: What happened to downloading games from The Pirate Bay?
description:
This post is on piracy. Piracy of software, games, movies, music and other virtual goods.
Before I continue writing this post let me confess to you that I used to use pirated software. I played games downloaded from the internet. And movies I watches ‘on demand’ by downloading them when I wanted to. There were times when there were no legally purchased songs on my iPod.
After reinstalling my Mac a few weeks ago I noticed something remarkable.
